languages.text: {n}Голос эльдарки слаб, но ваш Толкователь улавливает ее тихую мольбу:{/n} "О Иша, дай мне сил смотреть, но не видеть. Слышать, но не внимать торжеству духовной тьмы..."

traits.locale_text: [draft] {n}Голос эльдарки слаб, точно шелест ветра, но ваш вокс улавливает ее тихую мольбу.{/n} "О Иша, дай мне сил смотреть, но не видеть. Слышать, но не внимать торжеству духовной тьмы..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet's voice is weak, but your Elucidator still picks up her quiet plea:{/n} "Isha, give me the strength to look without seeing. To hear without heeding the triumph of spiritual darkness..."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос эльдарки слаб, но ваш Толкователь улавливает ее тихую мольбу:{/n} "О Иша, дай мне сил смотреть, но не видеть. Слышать, но не внимать торжеству духовной тьмы..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet's voice is weak, but your Elucidator still picks up her quiet plea:{/n} "Isha, give me the strength to look without seeing. To listen without heeding the triumph of spiritual darkness..."
{n}Yrliet's voice is weak, but your Elucidator still picks up her quiet plea:{/n} "Isha, give me the strength to look without seeing. To listen without heeding the triumph of spiritual darkness..."
{n}Yrliet's voice is weak, but your Elucidator still picks up her quiet plea:{/n} "Isha, give me the strength to look without seeing. To hear without heeding the triumph of spiritual darkness..."
{n}Yrliet's voice is weak, but your Elucidator still picks up her quiet plea:{/n} "Isha, give me the strength to look without seeing. To hear without heeding the triumph of spiritual darkness..."
{n}Yrliet's voice is weak, but your Elucidator still picks up her quiet plea:{/n} "Isha, give me the strength to look without seeing. To hear without heeding the triumph of spiritual darkness..."
{n}Yrliet's voice is weak, but your Elucidator still picks up her quiet plea:{/n} "Isha, give me the strength to look without seeing. To hear without heeding the triumph of spiritual darkness..."

languages.text: {n}Yrliets Stimme ist schwach, aber dein Elucidator empfängt ihre stille Bitte dennoch:{/n} "Isha, gebt mir die Kraft, zu sehen, ohne zu sehen. Zu hören, ohne den Triumph spiritueller Dunkelheit zu erleben ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's voice is weak, but your Elucidator still picks up her quiet plea:{/n} "Isha, give me the strength to look without seeing. To hear without heeding the triumph of spiritual darkness..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliets Stimme ist schwach, aber dein Elucidator empfängt ihre stille Bitte dennoch:{/n} "Isha, gebt mir die Kraft, zu sehen, ohne zu sehen. Zu hören, ohne den Triumph spiritueller Dunkelheit zu erleben ..."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet s'exprime à voix basse, mais votre élucidateur parvient à capter sa supplique :{/n} « Isha, donne-moi la force de regarder sans voir. D'entendre sans écouter le triomphe de l'obscurité spirituelle... »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's voice is weak, but your Elucidator still picks up her quiet plea:{/n} "Isha, give me the strength to look without seeing. To hear without heeding the triumph of spiritual darkness..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet s'exprime à voix basse, mais votre élucidateur parvient à capter sa supplique :{/n} « Isha, donne-moi la force de regarder sans voir. D'entendre sans écouter le triomphe de l'obscurité spirituelle... »

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特的声音非常微弱，但你的阐释器依然接收到了她安静的祈祷。{/n}“爱莎在上，赐予我力量，让我不再看到眼前的一切，让我不再聆听邪恶灵魂的狂欢……”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's voice is weak, but your Elucidator still picks up her quiet plea:{/n} "Isha, give me the strength to look without seeing. To hear without heeding the triumph of spiritual darkness..."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特的声音非常微弱，但你的阐释器依然接收到了她安静的祈祷。{/n}“爱莎在上，赐予我力量，让我不再看到眼前的一切，让我不再聆听邪恶灵魂的狂欢……”

languages.text: {n}La voz de Yrliet es débil, pero tu Dilucidador recoge su oración queda:{/n} «Isha, dame fuerzas para mirar sin ver. Para escuchar sin oír el triunfo de la oscuridad espiritual...».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's voice is weak, but your Elucidator still picks up her quiet plea:{/n} "Isha, give me the strength to look without seeing. To hear without heeding the triumph of spiritual darkness..."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Yrliet es débil, pero tu Dilucidador recoge su oración queda:{/n} «Isha, dame fuerzas para mirar sin ver. Para escuchar sin oír el triunfo de la oscuridad espiritual...».

languages.text: {n}ユリエットの声は弱いが、あなたのエルシデイターは彼女の静かな祈りを拾い上げた。{/n}「イシャよ、注視せずに見守る力を、精神の闇の勝利に耳を傾けずに聞く力を与えたまえ…」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's voice is weak, but your Elucidator still picks up her quiet plea:{/n} "Isha, give me the strength to look without seeing. To hear without heeding the triumph of spiritual darkness..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットの声は弱いが、あなたのエルシデイターは彼女の静かな祈りを拾い上げた。{/n}「イシャよ、注視せずに見守る力を、精神の闇の勝利に耳を傾けずに聞く力を与えたまえ…」

languages.text: {n}Yrliet'in sesi zayıf çıksa da ama Aydınlatıcın hâlâ sessiz yakarışlarını duyabiliyor.{/n} "İşa, bana görmeden bakma gücü ver. Manevi karanlığın zaferini dikkate almadan duyma gücü ver..."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's voice is weak, but your Elucidator still picks up her quiet plea:{/n} "Isha, give me the strength to look without seeing. To hear without heeding the triumph of spiritual darkness..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet'in sesi zayıf ama senin Aydınlatıcı'n hâlâ onun sessiz yakarışını duyuyor.{/n} "İşa, bana görmeden bakma gücü ver. Manevi karanlığın zaferini dikkate almadan duyma gücü ver..."
